title: Come Closer
description: From the author of "Saturn's Return to New York "comes this dark psychological thriller. "'What we think is impos-sible happens all the time.' So claims the beguiling narrator of "Come Closer," and after reading this spare and menacing tale, the reader has to agree. Sara Gran has created a sly, satisfying (fast!) novel of one young woman possessed not only by a demon but also by her own secret desires."--Stewart O'Nan "From the Hardcover edition."
author: Sara Gran
